title: Metering Mode Metadata & Performance Improvements
summary: Frames now captures your camera's metering mode alongside exposure data, giving you a more complete record of how each shot was measured. This update also brings performance improvements for a faster, more stable experience throughout the app.

sections.content: You can now record which metering mode your camera used for each frame. Whether you're shooting with center-weighted, spot, or evaluative metering, Frames captures this metadata alongside your existing exposure settings. This helps you understand how your camera measured light for each shot and refine your approach to exposure over time.

sections.alt: Frames film photography app showing metering mode metadata recording for exposure analysis

sections.content: Under-the-hood improvements make Frames faster and more responsive. Navigation between film rolls, frame recording, and metadata editing all benefit from optimized performance. These refinements contribute to a smoother experience when managing your analog photography workflow.

improvements: Added metering mode metadata field for comprehensive exposure documentation
Improved app performance for faster navigation and frame recording
Enhanced stability when switching between film rolls and editing frames
Optimized memory usage for smoother operation with large film libraries
